name: Game Lynch The Game
description:
In this game you will experience first hand what it is like to take part in Game Roast (ex Game Lynch). Game Roast is a special event during DevGAMM where your game is reviewed by an expert within 5 minutes in the most hilarious and blatant way possible!

DevGAMM is the biggest conference for game industry professionals in Russia, Ukraine and Belarus.

DISCLAIMER 1. All the events and characters in this game are non-fictional and all the similarities are intentional. These are not made to offend anyone in any way.

DISCLAIMER 2. The game is designed for mobile devices only and played best with touch input. Expect major frustration on PC.
